RegJSGen

Generate RegExps from RegJSParserâ€™s AST.

Installation

bash npm install --save regjsgen

Usage

js var regjsgen = require('regjsgen'); // With `regjsparser` var regjsparser = require('regjsparser'); var regex = '^a$'; var ast = regjsparser.parse(regex); // Modify AST // ... // Regenerate `RegExp` regex = regjsgen.generate(ast);

See Also

  • RegJSParser
  • RegExp.js

Testing

Run the command

bash npm test

To create a new reference file, execute

bash node test/update-fixture.js

from the repo top directory.

Support

Tested in Node.js 0.8.26~0.10.30.
